desc: Rainbow ARC Boutique offers a variety or handmade women graphic tees. We also accept custom orders; birthday shirts, business logos, family gatherings, etc.

layout.text: Welcome! I'm so glad you're here!

My current turn around time for ready-to-ship items are 2-4 business days (does not include weekends and holidays). Made-to-order items are 7-10 business days (does not include weekends and holidays). Thank you for your support and happy shopping!
